001    package ca.hullabaloo.util.cache;
002    
003    /**
004     * Allows retrieval of a cache by name.
005     * 
006     * @author Darren Gilroy
007     */
008    public interface CacheManager {
009            /**
010             * returns a cache with the given name
011             * 
012             * @return a cache
013             */
014            public Cache getCache(Object key);
015    
016            /**
017             * Clears all caches managed by this cache manager
018             */
019            public void clear();
020    }
